Package controller.state

Class Phase

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.state.Phase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditPhase, GamePhase
    public abstract class Phase
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class for the Phase implementation of state pattern
